website_summaries.verdict: This model provides the look, quality, and feel of a genuine leather product.
pros: Good quality at the price point
Fits a 15" steering wheel very well
cons: The product comes folded and has a crease when it first comes out of the packaging

customer_reviews.title: Great steering wheel cover!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these-one for my daughter’s new Toyota Corolla SE (blue trim) and one for my 2016 Volvo XC90 Inscription (black trim). My steering wheel is 14.25 inches in diameter and my daughter’s is 14.5 inches in diameter. These covers have dressed up the steering wheels and given them a nice chunkier feel. My steering wheel is heated (which I only use late December through early March), so I don’t know how much heat I will feel during those months. I’m very pleased and installation only took a few minutes but I did leave them in the cars overnight in our Houston heat and they were pliable enough to put on with a very nice snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: scutrone

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable steering wheel cover!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Looks so good on my MINI Cooper R56 2nd Gen. It’s also very comfortable to hold and steer. Do buy!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Luxury quality, deal breaking price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cover I’ve bought ever. I’ve bought expensive “fancy” ones over my life, but this one shocked me! I was expecting a mediocre leather feel since the price is fairly low...but WOW!! It’s supple yet heavy duty! Bought this for my Town and Country luxury touring, hoping to prevent the damage the Florida sun did on my accord’s steering wheel. I’m wishing i had bought another for my Accord!! I also got this with Same Day Shipping! I love that service!!
customer_reviews.author: Cherries27

customer_reviews.title: Extremely hard to install
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful steering wheel cover but my husband had a hell of a time installing it on our 15.3 inch steering wheel in our 2017 ford f 250. He had to use two long metal bars to stretch and install it, he tried 4 times and afterwards was sweating as if he ran a marathon. It’s installed and looks great but it is slightly crooked due to difficulty of install. Hopefully it can stretch and we can move it to be correctly placed.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Very Good leather
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2014 Honda Civic coupe. This fits a little loose on my wheel. But over time I think it’s shrinking to the wheel. It’s been two months so far The grip is excellent. Really good. The leather feels very premium. I was skeptical at first. But love it now.
customer_reviews.author: SaiBorg007

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cover with the thin red lines. It looks amazing! The cover adds a lot of thickness to the wheel which I don't mind, but might be too much for people with smaller hands. Everything else that other reviewers said is true. The product comes folded, but the crease disappears after a bit. There are threads that come off immediately- which was weird considering I hadn't used it yet. This product doesn't come with a tag, brand name, or instructions. It's easy to put on though and other reviewers give nice tips. All in all, solid product and a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Buy It, Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. The quality, look and feel of this product is A+. It fit perfectly on my 2003 Frontier Steering wheel and it was very easy to put on. Shipping was fast!
customer_reviews.author: shadowlesss

customer_reviews.title: Fake Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: This is not genuine leather. It is genuine Faux Leather. This was very deceiving advertisement
customer_reviews.author: Surgeon on Duty

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I love this steering wheel cover!!! It fits perfectly on my Mercedes C300. It’s a little thick to grip my hands on the wheel but after a while I got used to it. I love the bling and it does NOT hurt my hands or feels uncomfortable. It DOES NOT look cheap at all. Highly recommend buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Angela A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sparkly
customer_reviews.text: This fit my Dodge Charger. I definitely would recommend this one. Very sparkly and sits in front rather than on the side. Not very comfortable but gorgeous. Would need to make sure you wash your hands before driving to get off any dirt so that you don’t mess up the rhinestones. I rated this product a 1 Star of comfort though. Not very soft or comfortable. Leaves rhinestone engravings in your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: I love this cover!
customer_reviews.text: First off this thing is so kitschy and adorable it sparks a ton of joy for me. It was a little tough to get it onto my steering wheel by myself but I think that’s par for the course if you want it to stay on. Also the gems are a little scratchy at first but once you get used to it, you don’t even notice. And the gems sparkle in the sun so much it’s so fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit on my STI  Only way you could possibly get any better if you had some 8 year  dude  Lace them  Up like old style....
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for my STI! Perfect fit and now my steering wheel is protected from my greasy, oily hands!
customer_reviews.author: L Huck

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Very thick though.
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this cover. It’s soft but not slippery like my original leather steering wheel. Seems very high quality. Was relatively easy to install, I let it sit a few days after receiving it because it was smushed in the package and was egg shaped. Only complaint which the manufactures can’t really help but for other people with small hands it matters is how thick it is. As you can see in my picture my fingers JUST touch when wrapping my hand around it. I got used to it, but that may bother some people.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Almost too good to be true.
customer_reviews.text: I have a new car and the steering wheel is a little thin. I needed a nice new steering wheel cover and wanted something special. After much looking and reading I found this actual, all leather cover. The price was reasonable and no shipping charge. Well it arrived today and its beautiful. It went on easily but feels snug once on the wheel. It is definitely a great addition to the looks of the interior and it feels great. Oh and it arrived ahead of schedule. Too good to be true? Apparently not. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Engman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! Was worried the rhinestones would fall off but they’re all still perfectly intact after a few weeks. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kimmi

customer_reviews.title: excellent fit, looks sharp, tight install
customer_reviews.text: awesome steering wheel cover. Thought it was a bit difficult to install, but, finally got it on my steering wheel of my new gmc sierra truck. fits tight on the wheel, definitely will not slide cause of the rubber inside the cover. leather feels great while driving. only complaint is once you get the cover on, it only covers about 2/3-3/4 of the outside edge of the steering wheel. overall, excellent product. almost sent it back, didnt think i could install it. trick was to use a few clamps to hold on to the cover tight to the wheel while installing. the last 1/3 of the cover was really hard getting on, but i finally did it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Comfortable and Easy to Put On
customer_reviews.text: This fits my 2016 Jetta like a glove. Went on easily, using a recommendation from another reviewer for two people to do the job. One holds it in place at the bottom and the other stretched it up and around. It didn’t need much stretching for this steering wheel. Also took the recommendation of warming it first. So we left it on the car seat for an hour or so. This VW wheel is already substantial in size, but even with the cover it’s still quite comfortable for my not so large female hands. Very nice quality leather and worth the very attractive price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BASO

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It fits the 2016 Honda Civic LX steering wheel, perfectly. I love it!!! I thought it would make the steering wheel too thick for my hands, but it actually made it fit better than it did before. Some people said they had a hard time to install, for me that was not an issue at all. I am very happy with my purchase and I don't know how some people get paid to receive and review stuff and get paid for it. I bought this with my own money, I did not get paid to review it.
customer_reviews.author: lucy b petreus

customer_reviews.title: Nice even for aging mom
customer_reviews.text: Fits mom's 2019 X2 beautifully. She has light color seats and the color of steering wheel (got the pink) adds a nice compliment. Mom's not old but getting there and I would say in two or three years that BMW will still have very low mileage and be mine. Might as well get it all blinged out now. :) Mom loves the steering wheel cover! :)
customer_reviews.author: Silkylady1123

customer_reviews.title: Nice wheel cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice wheel cover and easy to install. It takes a little patience and some effort, but fits well on my Chevy truck. Understand that this is not a sewn-on cover to replace your factory steering wheel finish. The seams are visible and you might see and/or feel them. Simply line up your center point, I recommend starting at the top and working down, start rotating the cover with your hands firmly gripped on the cover. At the bottom you will have to pull the rear seam over the wheel and it will take a little strength. Then rotate your grip front to back to adjust. Take your time and it should fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: Late_to_the_Party

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a nice looking steering wheel cover. It feels soft to the touch and quality control is on point. I would recommend this to anyone wanting to add a unique look in their vehicle. The cover does add some thickness to the steering wheel overall but not bad, just might take some time to get used to the difference. Bought the size small for my 2011 Honda Civic LX and installation was easy. It helps if you let it warm up on your dashboard to give it some elasticity.
customer_reviews.author: Angel n Rachel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOOKING, AND GREAT FITTING. PRICED RIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful item. The pictures I took don't do it justice. This is my second one. I have one in black for my weekend car and the blue one is for my daily driver.both my cars come with leather steering wheels from the factory but I like something thicker and this fits the bill. It makes both wheels just thick enough. The stitching matches the stitching on the Jeep's seats.. easy install. Line up the bottom with the middle of the steering wheel and just roll it on. Make sure the car is off first so the steering wheel doesn't move. It's easy. I highly recommend this product. Price is great and the picture speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel and appearance.
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the quality and feel of the cover. At first glance I was afraid it was too small but gave it a try. I centered the cover, started at the top center and worked my way down, alternating sides. When I got down to the bottom it was a challenge but I installed it on my steering wheel without too much trouble. Pretty good for a middle aged woman. It seems like it will stay put, which is good because I can't stand when anything is crooked.
customer_reviews.author: mypenname

customer_reviews.title: Won't Mount!
customer_reviews.text: Can't get even close to mounting on steering wheel. Spent 45 mins... too much for me, I am male.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Driving in comfort
customer_reviews.text: It was a good decision getting this wheel cover for my 2018 Camry LE. I hurt my thumbs and this makes the wheel much more comfortable to hold. I chose the black with black lines, and the leather where I rest my hands is smooth. It feels padded but it is just because of the extra protection of the leather. I found that it made a huge difference in comfort in my case because the steering wheel on the new Camry LE is just a very hard molded plastic. It was also easy to get on, we did not have to put it in the sun or use a hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: hypnoshop

customer_reviews.title: A tight fit to be sure, but a welcome one.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the wheel cover. It's comfortable and soft. It fits tight on the steering wheel and doesn't slide around. That said, installation was a bit tricky and required some fairly moderate force to stretch the cover out around the steering wheel. (I am a fairly average build guy with 20+ years of automotive repair experience for reference) Zip ties are your friend here! Also locking the steering wheel from turning is helpful. I did not heat the cover up to stretch it although that sounds like a last resort. I would not expect my mother in law to be able to install this steering wheel cover.
customer_reviews.author: Matt K

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 2017 Acura
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black cover with black lines for my 2017 Acura ILX and it was a perfect snug fit! The quality of the leather not only looks but feels great too. (It has a soft cushioned feel on the outer part of the wheel) I had no problem putting it on my steering wheel, it took about 10-15 seconds tops. It did require a bit of effort to get the cover on the wheel but honestly it wasn’t as hard as I expected it to be. My only con is that I have small hands so it feels a bit bulky but I’ll get used to it. Overall I definitely recommend it and it won’t leave you dissatisfied :)
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: The best steering wheel cover on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable and attractive steering wheel cover I have found. I have a 2013 Volvo C30, a very sporty car. This cover not only fits perfectly, but the blue accent coordinates with the Volvo blue identity. Sure, its a tight fit so it takes some effort to put it on, but that's what you want, a tight fit. The grip is ergonomically superior to anything else I've tried. My car has a leather steering wheel to begin with, but it's thinner than I like so I've had a few beefy covers over the years, but nothing compares to this one. Buy it, you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking For
customer_reviews.text: As I said. Just what I was looking for. My steering wheel was showing some wear and I wanted to hide it plus add some comfort. This filled the bill. A bit over padded for my taste but not bad, nor to an extreme. went on with just a bit of effort and following the advice of others, I did lay it out and allow it to acclimate. Watch the mini-video of one other buyer, it helped me. And do start with it in your final desired position. It can be a pain to do overs. Good value for the money, I think and as always, shipping and delivery was totally on time and as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Coniferbrat

customer_reviews.title: A pain to get on but worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn't think it'd fit the standard 15 inch steering wheel. Had to approach it with top through the center and apply the top from behind while the bottom lays on the bottom front. Worked the top on then pulled sides from back wrapping it to the front and worked until I had the bottom. With all my fingers I had to pry the bottom in the adjust the sides. If you don't have a lot of arm strength this is going to be pretty tough to get on. It may help to lay it in the sun about an hour and let it soften. Once on it looks very nice and thick.
customer_reviews.author: Dal V

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Fit 2018 F150 XLT
customer_reviews.text: Ignore the green check-mark associated with large-size steering wheels saying it will fit >15.5” by using heat gun. My 2018 F150 wheel is 15 7/8” & even using a heat gun until cover is hot to touch, there’s no way this thing will fit. Inside of cover is stamped 37.5 (cm) which is about 14 3/4”, so expecting an inch of stretch without damage to my truck, the cover, or me is wishful thinking. Cover looks great & seems of good quality so I’m giving it two stars even though the advertising is faulty for my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: trishal

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good Difficult Install
customer_reviews.text: This steering wheel cover was extremely difficult to instal on a Chevy SUVl. I made it about half way through and just like the instructions describe on Amazon, it seemed IMPOSSIBLE!!! My boyfriend had to help me the rest of the way. He got it up there with no problem. I've had the cover on my wheel for about a week now. It looks great. Good quality material. Okay price. The cover takes some getting used to when driving since the *bling" part of the cover is hard especially when you turn the wheel. The leather back position adds some comfort so it's a good offset.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant of this product. I have bought 2 or 3 covers in the past 8 months 20 bucks each at pebble boys, autozone. The covers say "truck" on it none of them have fit properly as the one I bought on Amazon. On the bottom of the steering wheel the covers would open and not hug the steering wheel leaving a gap. The one from Amazon fits like a glove and the leather feels like high quality. I bought it 1/2 bigger keep that in mind when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: The 1

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful look and feel. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very suave look and a beautiful feel. I put this on my 2017 Civic and it fits beautifully. It makes turning the steering wheel such a pleasure! Like any steering wheel cover, it took a bit of elbow grease to get it on but it was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Makes driving easier and safer
customer_reviews.text: I just got a new car for Christmas and the steering wheel was slippery whenever I made a turn. I was afraid that one day my hands would accidentally slip while turning. This wheel cover fits the Honda CR-V Touring 2018 perfectly. I like that it has a grip to it. I used it today when going to work, I have to drive down a mountain and this wheel cover helped me keeps my hands at the wheel when making those sharp turns.
customer_reviews.author: Foodie_Explorer415

customer_reviews.title: Fit well on my 2008 Honda Accord Coupe worn steering wheel...
customer_reviews.text: Fit well on my 2008 Honda Accord Coupe worn steering wheel. Was concerned that it might be too large based on some of the reviews. However, it was tight getting it onto the wheel and while I can make it move slightly in areas by gripping it tightly and twisting it hard, I feel very comfortable driving with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sola Scriptura

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with poor grip strength.
customer_reviews.text: This wheel cover helped me grip the steering wheel so much better. I have a muscle wasting disease which has diminished my arm strength and finger dexterity. This condition affects grip and finger strength, preventing me from holding the steering wheel firmly. The extra padding surrounded by the soft leather has allowed me to feel confident once again. I could not put the cover over the wheel when I received it, but eventually I found someone to do it for me. Also, it looks great on the steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: John Sliman

customer_reviews.title: Not genuine leather
customer_reviews.text: It is not leather as advertised. Even says on the package that it is a no odor, eco-friendly material. It includes a small leather scrap that is nothing like what it is made of. It was very hard to get on and centered. Once done it looks great, however. I hope the material holds up to the heat in my car. I really wanted a genuine leather cover. Why can’t sellers tell the truth?
customer_reviews.author: Janet R.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: another example of a designer creating something that they don't use themselves. very very beautiful, but way too uncomfortable to stand using. it's looks were what kept me trying for a week to get used to it. no deal. the sewn-in double edging that creates the beautiful look is exactly the problem. it almost feels like grabbing the edge of a table. i have big hands, toughened by years of martial arts, carpentry, weapon fabrication, and ladder work, and i was still bothered by it after 7 days. that's how badly designed it is. very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: tsah_yawd

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2015 GMC Terrain Wheel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because for reasons that escape me I have managed to put 3 snags in my steering wheel accidentally with the ring on my right hand. I didn’t want to keep damaging it so I decided to get this cover. I bought the red because the inside of my vehicle had red thread accents and red lights at night. It does feel premium. It did arrive folded but the creases seemed to disappear as soon as I put it on. Was easy enough to get in and off to readjust. Definitely makes the wheel a lot thicker, but I’m sure I’ll get used to it. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 2020 Dodge Challenger Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I got the 14 1/2-15 1/4 size and it fit my Dodge Challenger scat pack perfectly. Looks nice and has a good feel but will take some getting used to. Installation took less then 5 minutes and was easy, here’s how: - Let the cover sit in the sun for 30 minutes - Follow the instructions and start from the top, fight for every inch - make sure a man does it. It’s like opening a pickle jar and takes some hand strength!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Conover

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a 2017 F150 to small
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit a 2017 F150. It took me 45 minutes four hands and two sets of pliers to force it on. There is a rubber backing inside the interior of the grip (to hold it in place once installed) that ended up be separated about half an inch because the overall circumference was to small. I measure my steering wheel and by the dimensions listed it should fit however its just to small and impassable to install for me to recommend this to anyone. PS. Now that I have it on and stretched I will be leaving it on to use it but I do not recommend getting this if your vehicle is the same as mine
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not creased...
customer_reviews.text: I just put the small size on my 2016 Prius. I noticed the factory “pleather” covering on the steering wheel starting to peel and degrade, so I wanted a cover. Normally I am not a fan of aftermarket covers but this one is nice. It does make the wheel noticeably thicker, but it’s not a problem as far as I’m concerned. Unlike the products apparently shipped to others, it arrived in a box that did not cause it to be folded or creased. It looks great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Eskite

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for Jeep Cherokee TH, the red stitching was perfect for the Trim on the TH. The fit is snug and requires some manipulation to get it on right. I never cover a steering wheel, but my husband will be driving the vehicle too, and he destroyed steering wheels...don't know why but his generally disintegrate within a few years. Plus the red stitching really looks nice. Will see how it holds up! Arrived right away, nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper's Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Only fits trucks—amazon don’t know it’s products
customer_reviews.text: Amazon goes again to disappoint me. The size was two sizes too big. Amazon claimed it fit my car. So I was dumb enough to trust it knows it’s business. Amazon needs to start checking its products and make sure that when it claims it will fit it really will. Very pretty but it’s so incredibly big I may have to give to someone driving a semi truck 🚛 so that at least someone other than me gets to use the darn thing. Dissatisfied and disappointed Amazon lack of concern
customer_reviews.author: Love love it.

customer_reviews.title: Yes, this will even fit on a F250 Super Duty Steering Wheel
customer_reviews.text: This thing will make your car/truck look fancier. It's extremely difficult to get on the steering wheel... But here is how I got it on my F250 steering wheel. After thinking for a good week that this thing wouldn't fit, I finally looked on youtube where lots of people were saying "heat it up with a hair dryer". This can take forever. Instead: Heat this in your over at 200 F for 5-7 minutes. It will be hot. Then take it out to your car and wrestle the thing on. That's the only way to get these things on. But looks great and you'll feel very satisfied when your done!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive, perfect comfort level!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color (coffee); feels wonderful; worth every penny! Matches the interior of my 2005 CR-V. I've had 3 friends like mine so much, they bought ones to match their cars. Everyone with an older car loved them, but one friend said it made their steering wheel in their newer Jeep feel too thick. They were disappointed, as they loved it on my car! I guess you just have to try it! Personally, I think you'll very likely will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: My Hands Thank Me Every Time I Drive
customer_reviews.text: People tell me they like my wheel cover because it looks cool. I say yes, but I like it because it makes grabbing the steering wheel easier and much more comfortable. So much so that I'm pleasantly surprised when I grip the wheel my hands feel relaxed. When it comes to installation, it may require a little strength in getting it on for about a second or two, as it needs to be a snug fit on your steering wheel. But, that's with most wheel covers anyway. Overall, I'm very pleased with the purchase and would buy another one if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, feels great
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier, looks great and feels great right out of the box. I can't understand why anyone would want to buy a fake leather cover. The wrinkled part on the top is where it was folded in the box and it will smooth out. 5 stars for these great steering wheel covers.
customer_reviews.author: valley9

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I tugged and pulled and it was fairly easy to install I wasn’t prepared for it to be as thick as it is I don’t have the largest hand so it’s going to be a matter of time before I feel like I truly have a grip I’m slightly concerned that I don’t have as much control as I did before with this new cover I would never want to get in an accident because I didn’t grip hard enough but all in all it looks attractive it feels good and if you’ve got medium to large hands you shouldn’t have any problem with it
customer_reviews.author: A in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Don't think it's real leather.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about a year ago thinking it was real leather. Had a nice feel to it and it was easy to install. Year later, i started to notice that the leather part where it's patterned is starting peel. So I'm guessing that the patterned parts are Faux Leather. Not that happy
customer_reviews.author: Tae Kim

customer_reviews.title: This steering wheel cover looks great
customer_reviews.text: I give this steering wheel cover 5-stars for how good it looks. It's really got a beautiful design and stitching. While it looks great, it's not the most comfortable cover to rest your hands on while you drive. There's a lot of different textures and edges on the leather so it's definitely easy to grip, but all those busy textures make it feel rough. The roughness is tolerable and I'm keeping it, but I did knock off 1 star. Comfort has to account for something.
customer_reviews.author: RayD

customer_reviews.title: Just what my steering wheel needed
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14 3/4 steering wheel. Looks great. Feels great. Perfect fit (size: medium). It took about 10 minutes to put on, but once it was on it was the perfect fit. I've only had it on for a few weeks. I'll see it it is in a few months. Update: it fits well. It's a tiny bit snug/loose on the right side. Maybe it's just the shape of my steering wheel. It doesn't move around though, so snug must be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, looks sharp, not too hard to install
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my 2016 4 Runner. Thought at first I might have had the wrong size but I kept on working it and it went on perfectly. Just keep slipping it around the wheel and as it get close kind of pull it over the last bit. Try to line up the seam at the bottom between the two wheel supports. I bought the black with red trim as it matches the interior. This cover arrived laid out flat in a large zip lock. I did not notice any strong odor from the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Swamp Fox

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect, Almost......
customer_reviews.text: I was initially very impressed with the apparent quality upon unpacking. Excellent feel to it, almost has a slight tackiness which enhances the grip. Not to mention, looks great. However, the leather covering is no more than 1 mm thick (thinner than 1 mm). Within the first week as my wife was driving, her wedding ring ran along it and cut into the thin leather material. It has since peeled and I have a quarter sized hole. The material under the thin leather is not dyed so it’s very obvious. It’s too bad but I’ll be shopping for a new one from another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: ForensicPhD

customer_reviews.title: Big seams cause discomfort when driving.
customer_reviews.text: I foolishly purchased this product based on the glowing reviews and the picture which makes the cover look very stylish. And while it is true that it looks great, it is very uncomfortable to actually use. The seams on the wheel cover are raised WAY too high and dig into your hand while you are gripping the wheel. It's slightly better if you install the cover the wrong way so that the seams are facing the front of your car, that way they dig into your fingers as opposed to your palm. A very stupid compromise that you shouldn't have to accept. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Kim

customer_reviews.title: Superior Cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is super thick. It was tricky getting it to fit the steering wheel. Start at the top and work your way down. It was a short challenge getting it to fit all the way to the bottom of the wheel. Takes some muscle but worth it. This is a quality cover!
customer_reviews.author: vicki morical

customer_reviews.title: Black Leather/Black Stitching Steering Wheel Cover 15"
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sleek looking steering wheel cover. I purchased 3 years ago for my 2017 Hyundai Elantra. I bought a new oone for my 2019 Tucson. It fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.author: I❤️Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Steering wheel protector
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't that tough to get on, there were 2 of us and didn't need to be as others reviewed. I did step into my SUV the next day, in AZ mind you, and the wheel cover was almost as hot as my wheel normally is. I will need to remove it in the winter because I have heated steering and don't think that will work. But for now, I'm loving it, it makes my steering wheel quite fat.
customer_reviews.author: Tenacious

customer_reviews.title: Fine Corinthian leather
customer_reviews.text: I don't exaggerate when I state that the quality of this item is superb. I'd have paid twice the price. the stitvhing is similar to a fine leather jacket, installation, unlike the cheaper covers, was a breeze. Best I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Longmire

customer_reviews.title: No doubt, an Steering Wheel Cover that is it worth to purchase.
customer_reviews.text: To make things short and clear if you purchase this steering wheel cover you will not regret it and you will be very satisfied in every aspect. Yes, you have to make a good physical effort installing it because that is a must in order to fit properly. The design, construction, and materials are to last practically forever. It may be appropriate to apply some leather protection.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Feels Great, and Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Too early to write anything but a first impressions review. I just have put this on a 2019 Subaru Crosstrek with the non-leather wrapped steering wheel. First impressions then : fits lie a glove, was easy to install. Its comfortable and looks great. All that being said, lets give it three to six months to see how it holds up after a little use. So far so good. No complaints, and really its just as good as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: One Man Looking

customer_reviews.title: Looks good  but what about busted seams right out of the bag?
customer_reviews.text: The cover looked very good when we pulled it out of the bag. However, on the side there was a busted seam. There was no hole or anything, but the decorative stitch thread was broken and loose in the area of about 1.5"-2" long. It was disappointing. Packed right back and returned. Didn't even want to bother with replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Adams

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Installed fairly easily on my 2009 Mercedes CLS 550. Have to pull hard at bottom to get it on, but once you get the hang of it, it’s simple. Very comfortable and would recommend to any and all looking for a stylish and perfect feeling steering wheel cover. Best purchase I have made for my car in years. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome steering wheel cover!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! I found this advertised on Facebook with the title, "30 great things to buy that you haven't seen on Amazon". The cover comes in a variety of different styles and colors. I ordered the Bing cover and I love it. The look and feel of it is great and I get lots of compliments on it. I bought a retro cover for my husband's car and he loves it too! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: avaloskc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I did not review drying power, as this is a leather steering wheel cover, not sure what drying power has to do with anything. The steering wheel cover was fairly easy to install per the instructions. The grip is very comfortable and stays fairly cool even in extreme heat. Have not had it long enough to tell how it will react to extreme cold. Perhaps I will need to update this in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Tommptk

customer_reviews.title: FITS perfectly for my S10 vehicle!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased another well known name steering wheel cover that was purported to fit once heated in the Sun....well I can tell you that is complete nonsense. If it is really leather as I required, and is specifically sized to your steering wheel within 1/8th", it will do exactly what you want. This product was and did fit perfectly tight as advertised on my '03 S10 ZR2 steering wheel...which means almost all S10's for years before too!
customer_reviews.author: Rick A. Matschke

customer_reviews.title: It took time, but I like it
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this thing was a pain in the neck to install. Took about a half an hour of wrestling to get it on. It does appear to be made of quality materials, but I find the seams to be very uncomfortable. They cut into my hands and don't provide a good grip. UPDATE I kept it and with time the seams softened up. I am now happy with it. Keeps the steering wheel a good temperature so it is never too hot or too cold to touch. Also I noticed that my hands don't get fatigued on long trips because the wheel cover is thick and makes the steering wheel diameter larger.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.  Easy install.  Hope it holds up!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Installation was 5 mins. Make sure you line up the pattern you want on the steering wheel beforehand. Also, you’re gonna need to tug at it a bit to get it on, but that is to be expected. Hopefully, it holds up. My last one started flaking after a year and a half or so. It was a different model by the same manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Bae

customer_reviews.title: Well made, nicely cushioned
customer_reviews.text: I love this leather cover - it is well made and nicely cushioned. Put it in the dryer to soften it up as it was winter when I bought it and difficult to pull over the wheel until warming made it more flexible. Otherwise in warmer weather, leave it in the sun to soften the leather before putting on the steering wheel. Line it up where you want the seams to be before pulling it on since it’s difficult to move once it is on the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Good once you get used to the thicker wheel
customer_reviews.text: Love this wheel cover. My hands are pretty rough so they were wearing into my stock starring wheel. This cover is easy to grip and comfortable. The only downside to this is it throws off the thickness of your wheel pretty severely. I was used to driving with two or three finger resting on the bottom of the wheel, now I have to use my hand to drive and grip the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kyei-Baffour

customer_reviews.title: Awesome accessory!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. It was not folded in half like others have said in the reviews. I heated the steering wheel indoors with a blow dryer since it’s currently 20 degrees Fahrenheit outside. I had no problems fitting it around the steering wheel which is 14.5” on my 2019 Mazda CX-5. I did remove and reinstall 3 times because I couldn’t get it centered right. My trick was to turn the steering wheel upside down and start by centering the bottom tab of the cover with the bottom spoke and working my way down to the top of the steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Flores

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions: fits my 2019 Toyota Tundra-Platinum edition Installation Tips: This cover is tight and you need to stretch it before putting it on. Crazy as it will sound, I took my foot and placed it in the cover and pulled. I did that in 4 directions and that gave it the stretch it needed to fit. Even after all that it was tight. The good news, I am very pleased with the final outcome. Looks good, smells good, and feels good! I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not easy to put on -- but it's not supposed to be. If it slipped on easily, it might be a hazard when driving. It took me about 15-20 minutes, but gradually I felt it stretching enough to reach the bottom. Overall, it looks and feels great. I had been searching for a steering wheel cover large enough for my Expedition and I am 100% pleased I got this one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rice, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Fit, but Somewhat Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The build quality and fit of this steering wheel cover are great. But if you already have a fairly thick steering wheel, this cover makes it feel much too thick! Still that's something that you can get used to over time unless you have small hands. The main issue in my opinion is that the cover is made of pieces that are stitched together. This stitching line is something I constantly feel and i do NOT like .... it feels uncomfortable. I wish it was all a one-piece cover around the steering wheel with stitching at 6:00 o'clock position only.
customer_reviews.author: Brisk2000

customer_reviews.title: Jazzy wheel cover.  Moderate patience to attach.
customer_reviews.text: This steering wheel cover looks great in my car which is red and black on the outside. I wouldn’t say it was easy to put it on but once I got the hang of it I really had No difficulty putting it on. It is important to center it at the top of wheel before starting and then slowly press it on, working From back to front. It took no more than 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Looks so much better than that warn down wheel!  Comfy too 😁
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, can be hard to jnstall, but there is a trick! If you have a 'shoe shelf' for your clothes dryer, cover the shelf with a t shirt and set the wheel cover on top. Run the dryer on high for 2 minutes and it should be soft enough to install!
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Bulky not for my car
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfy but it adds a great deal of width to your steering wheel. I have small hands and now my hands can barely fit around the steering wheel. It feels like my hands are too wide open. I don’t know if that makes sense. I have Audi A3 2018. It may be the steering wheel is already big. But also the cover doesn’t go all the way around the steering wheel, there’s some unprotected inner half of the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa O

customer_reviews.title: Installation
customer_reviews.text: Cover did not 'just slip on'...........it was a booger ! My first impression was to send it back.....way too small. However, took it on as a personal challenge and installed successfully. The 'secret' is to either lay it out in the hot sun for 30 mins or use a hairdryer to expand the cover and slowly work in around the steering wheel......don't let it beat you. (be sure the seam is at the bottom). Product is well built and looks good ...... well worth the effort to install.
customer_reviews.author: coker

customer_reviews.title: Great cover at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cover. Keeps my steering wheel covered so its protected, but also a nice subtle design to add more character to my vehicle. Quality of the steering wheel feels good. Stitching looks and seems great so far. Let's see how long the durability of the cover can last but so far so good! Nothing to complain about at this price point the value you are getting is worth it
customer_reviews.author: RealReviewsAlex

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Item was received in a zip lock bag inserted in a flat cardboard box. It fits perfect on a 15 inch steering wheel (2012 Nissan Frontier Truck. Easy to install (took 10 minutes) by following the instruction provided on the Amazon web site. Well made product, perfect stitching and looks classy on a black steering wheel with a grey interior. I have confidence this will last a few years. Highly recommended and will buy again if I get another vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: JDT

customer_reviews.title: Fits great! Heating leather helps installation!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great looks great on my 2011 Toyota Tundra. Heated the steering wheel cover up in front of my gas stove ( helps the leather stretch) as it fits very tightly like it should(always seems like there’s no way it will fit). Always start at one point (with cover centered if design matters)and work it around evenly side to side until on.
customer_reviews.author: J & R Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to use, but for some reason gives discomfort since there is space between two ends of the cover. That does not give complete comfort, but you get used to it after a while. I would recommend this product. It gives a good grip and is also easy to install, you don't need much instruction for it.
customer_reviews.author: sankaran

customer_reviews.title: What We Were Looking For
customer_reviews.text: It is leather and vinyl and has a padded feel. It looks and feels nice. Installation took some hand and arm strength, but wasn't bad. When you install it, be sure to line it up exactly where you want it because once it is on, it does not want to move, which is not really bad! It probably would have helped if I had left the cover on the dash in the hot sun for 30 minutes before installing it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B Myers

customer_reviews.title: Charged for return item
customer_reviews.text: Originally gave 3 stars because the product didn't fit my car as snug as I wanted. But overall it was an ok product. I returned the product within a week however I got an email today stating that the product was never returned. Tracking number states otherwise. So I'm confused as to what happened. Reverted to 1 star as, there might be a misunderstanding. Leaving one star for now until customer support can respond.
customer_reviews.author: W. Chan

customer_reviews.title: FITS HONDA EX-T PERFECTLY. STRONG GRIP.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the subtle hint of red in the steering wheel. I was looking for something that didn’t look too bulky, and this is it. The grip is very nice & doesn’t slip when turning the wheel! Even though you have to give it a good stretch to get it around the actual steering wheel, eventually it’ll fit perfectly. no tears, no loose stitching, nothing negative to say about this purchase. Wonderful addition to my Honda EX-T.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: very beautiful!!! easy to install, everything just as describe. looks nice on the wheel. Not too big nor too small. 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Thang

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great! Feels SO-SO
customer_reviews.text: This cover looks very nice! That is important to me, however, it makes the steering wheel feel thicker than I like and I have large hands. Also, the texture does not give that good of a grip. It has an embossed/checkered portion, yet even with that the grip feels a bit slick and is not as good as the vinyl steering wheel cover I have on my other car. I thought I would absolutely love this cover when I ordered it, yet after installing it my reaction is, "meh."
customer_reviews.author: PeterC

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match for the red stitching on the black dashboard of our Toyota Camry. Thank goodness it isn't cheap looking. We've had it for a few months now and it hasn't fallen apart yet. That's a real compliment nowadays. I'm not crazy about the way all the different pieces feel under my hands. I would prefer something smoother, but then it wouldn't look as snazzy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Does a decent job
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the black colored one for a month or so now, and it's nothing special but does a decent job for the price. My main complaint is that the wheel cover is folded for delivery, no doubt to fit it in all smaller box for cheaper shipping. Unfortunately the creases never really come out over time. However, it's not a huge deal and it fulfills the main job of protecting my steering wheel from wear. Would recommend as a cheap solution for anyone who needs a wheel cover that'll work in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The medium fit my 07 Acura TL
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on my 07 Acura TL so it’ll fit any Acura TL that is an 04-08. Left it in the sun on top of my hood of the car for about an hour to heat up and was easy to install after that. I got the Medium size by the way since that is the size of the steering wheel for this car. It did not come folded like many people have gotten theirs. They may have changed the way they ship this item and could be why I did not receive mine folded. I would buy this cover again if I ever need to replace this one with a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and protection it provides
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect on my 2014 Mercedes GLK350. Dont have to worry about scratching the steering wheel with keeys or anything. The only thing is, the cover is a bit thick so it will definitely feel weird grabbing the steering if you never had a cover before, but over time its hardly noticeable anymore.
customer_reviews.author: D_S

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at the great quality of the steering wheel cover for the price I paid... . Looks great on my steering wheel... I used a blow dryer to soften the leather up then stretched it. I lined the seam up with the bottom on my steering wheel then started putting it on starting at the top then working my way down the sides then to the bottom. I am a 60 yr old woman and I was able to do it without help...
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Products.
customer_reviews.text: This steering wheel cover is outstanding! It is easy to install but does take some strength to work it into position. Driving with this on the steering wheel is amazing. I have large hands and this cover fits perfectly. It eliminates cramping from having to grip a smaller wheel. Perfect Product!
customer_reviews.author: SAB51

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It’s super soft and smooth to the touch. It isn’t cheap feeling and the padding on it is nice and provides a bit of a cushion for my hand, but nothing outrageous. It has subtle personality to it with the pattern in some spots, without being too over the top and tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Reese G

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful steering wheel! Ordered a pink tho to march everything in my car and they sent me a purple. Very disappointed about that. Do not have the time to resend the item back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials and feels great
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this cover. I’m a tactile person and the way it feels is so nice. The leather feels soft and smooth. It’s also securely snug onto the wheel. I did have my husband out it on for me as I didn’t want to break a nail. I got it for my 08 BMW and it goes nicely with the interior.
customer_reviews.author: DeNage

customer_reviews.title: Workout!
customer_reviews.text: (Don't know what Drying Power of a wheel cover means in Rate Features). About a 30-minute upper-body workout to get the cover on the wheel. Had to use a long screwdriver to leverage the cover and stretch onto onto the wheel. Put it in the dryer to heat it up to make it supple but the heat didn't last long enough. When it was finally on, it's there for life. Looks good; feels good, which makes up for the difficulty of getting it on.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Looks & feels great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks wonderful! I took a hair dryer to it to make it a bit more pliable to put on; didn’t take long. I absolutely love orange & so thought the camel brown highlight would be a tasteful compromise & I am beyond pleased! I paired it with some brown rixxu sport seat covers I also bought on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Denjo

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, nice feel, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: My steering wheel is 14 1/2" and so I purchased the 14 1/2 - 15 1/4" version of this wheel cover. It was surprisingly easy to install. It has greatly improved the complexion of my car interior, and nicely masks worn areas of my Sonata's steering wheel. I enjoy the feel of it too. Nicely crafted and attractive, it is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: T Doherty

product_meta.title: Valleycomfy Universal 15 inch Auto Car Steering Wheel Cover with Black Genuine Leather for HRV CRV Accord Corolla Prius Rav4 Tacoma Camry X1 X3 X5 335i 535i,etc.
feature_bullets: Top Quality: Heavy duty genuine leather steering wheel cover, weighs 1.3 pounds+,nice soft thick leather gives you more control on the road.Inside a 100% odour free and skidproof lining ensures a constant reliable grip,your steering wheel will Warm in winter and cool in summer.

Easy installation: This Genuine leather steering wheel cover requires hassle-free installation. Simply slip it right on to your steering wheel and your good to go. Just place the cover on top of the steering wheel. Press and hold the upper part of the cover and gradually lower it with both hands on either side to tighten.
Suitable for all standard size steering wheels from 14.5 inch to 15.25 inches in diameter.
Increased Safety: Skidproof, stable, heat resistant,A better grip on the steering wheel gives you more control on the road.
Great touch feeling: Skidproof, stable, heat resistant and relieve driving fatigue,Genuine leather material bring you a great touch and feel.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,478 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
